name: Bill Explainer
description: AI-powered analysis of energy bills to help customers understand their usage patterns and costs

name: Savings Coach
description: Personalized recommendations to reduce energy costs through behavioral changes and efficiency tips

name: Offer Matchmaker
description: Intelligent matching of customers with the best energy plans based on their usage patterns and preferences

name: Smart Tiering
description: Dynamic tier optimization to help customers stay in the most cost-effective usage tiers
